summary: Build an e-commerce shopping app similar to Flipkart for buying items.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Simple shopping bag logo mark with warm orange/amber and charcoal on transparent background (app-logo.dim_256x256.png)
- Wide e-commerce hero banner illustration with abstract shopping elements in warm orange/amber palette (hero-banner.dim_1600x600.png)
- Minimal empty-state illustration showing an empty cart in warm orange/amber palette on transparent background (empty-cart.dim_800x600.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive e-commerce home experience with a top navigation bar (logo, search box, cart link, sign-in/out), featured banner, and category shortcuts.
Implement product catalog browsing with pagination or incremental loading, including product cards that show image, title, price, rating, and an 'Add to cart' button.
Implement search and filtering for products: text search, category filter, price range filter, and sort (Relevance, Price: Low to High, Price: High to Low, Rating).
Create a product details page showing a larger image gallery, full description/specs, price, rating, stock status, quantity selector, and 'Add to cart' button.
Implement a cart page with editable quantities, remove item, per-item subtotal, cart subtotal, and a 'Proceed to checkout' button.
Implement a checkout flow that collects shipping address and contact info, shows an order summary, and places an order (no real payment processing).
Add an 'Orders' page for signed-in users to view past orders and order details (items, totals, shipping info, status).

Add Internet Identity authentication support and user session-aware behavior: signed-in users have server-backed cart and orders; signed-out users can browse and maintain a local cart that can be merged on sign-in.
Frontend: implement data fetching and caching using React Query for product lists/details, cart, and orders; include loading, empty, and error states for all screens.

Apply a coherent visual theme across the app (colors, typography, spacing, components) with a distinct shopping-market style using warm orange/amber accents, off-white backgrounds, and charcoal text (avoid blue/purple).
Add generated static images to the frontend and use them in the UI (store in frontend/public/assets/generated) for logo, hero banner, and empty-state illustration.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a Flipkart-like e-commerce app for browsing and buying items
Backend: implement Motoko data models and APIs for products, categories, carts, and orders, including seed/sample product data available on first deploy.
